title: Read Markdown Tables into Tibbles
text: readMDTable converts raw markdown tables string, file, URL tibbles. Many sites (like GitHub) convert markdown tables HTML tables. types tables ’re probably better using rvest.

text: Install GitHub:

text: Read Markdown Table Tibble

title: Read a Markdown Table into a Tibble — read_md_table
Read a Markdown Table into a Tibble — read_md_table
text: file Either path file, connection, literal data (either single string raw vector). Files starting ⁠http://⁠, ⁠https://⁠, ⁠ftp://⁠, ⁠ftps://⁠ automatically downloaded. ... Arguments passed readr::read_delim

title: Read a Markdown Table into a Tibble — read_md_table
text: tibble created markdown table

title: Read a Markdown Table into a Tibble — read_md_table
text: read_md_table reads markdown table tibble string, file, URL. uses readr::read_delim efficiently read data. read_md_table warn potential issues provided markdown table. Depending issue, read_md_table may still correctly read table.

title: Read a Markdown Table into a Tibble — read_md_table
code:
read_md_table("| H1 | H2 | 
|-----|-----|
| R1C1 | R1C2 |
| R2C1 | R2C2 |") #> Rows: 2 Columns: 2 #> ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Delimiter: "|" #> chr (2): H1, H2 #>  #> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   H1    H2    #>   <chr> <chr> #> 1 R1C1  R1C2  #> 2 R2C1  R2C2     read_md_table(read_md_table_example("mtcars.md")) #> Rows: 32 Columns: 12 #> ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Delimiter: "|" #> chr  (1): model #> dbl (11): mpg, cyl, disp, hp, drat, wt, qsec, vs, am, gear, carb #>  #> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. #> # A tibble: 32 × 12 #>    model         mpg   cyl  disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec    vs    am  gear  carb #>    <chr>       <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1 Mazda RX4    21       6  160    110  3.9   2.62  16.5     0     1     4     4 #>  2 Mazda RX4 …  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.88  17.0     0     1     4     4 #>  3 Datsun 710   22.8     4  108     93  3.85  2.32  18.6     1     1     4     1 #>  4 Hornet 4 D…  21.4     6  258    110  3.08  3.22  19.4     1     0     3     1 #>  5 Hornet Spo…  18.7     8  360    175  3.15  3.44  17.0     0     0     3     2 #>  6 Valiant      18.1     6  225    105  2.76  3.46  20.2     1     0     3     1 #>  7 Duster 360   14.3     8  360    245  3.21  3.57  15.8     0     0     3     4 #>  8 Merc 240D    24.4     4  147.    62  3.69  3.19  20       1     0     4     2 #>  9 Merc 230     22.8     4  141.    95  3.92  3.15  22.9     1     0     4     2 #> 10 Merc 280     19.2     6  168.   123  3.92  3.44  18.3     1     0     4     4 #> # ℹ 22 more rows
